𓈀 𓇿 𓇾 easy confusion

N18 tar/gar/ BT:broad bread 𓈀 N18X ⇔ tight/Teig carne 𓊔 𓈁 N18A 𓈂 N19 𓈃 LEN=Länge

𓈀 | aroura (of land), sheet (of metal) | 𓈙 𓏤 sṯꜣt ≈ sheet

𓈀 𓈇 𓏤 | island | ደሴት däset جَزِيرَة jazīra 𓈀 𓈇 𓏤 | island | ⲙⲟⲩⲓ moui ⲙⲟⲩⲉ moue mꜣwt 𓌳 𓄿 𓏲 𓏏 𓈇 νῆσος nêsos <> mauretan 𓈀 𓏤 𓋳 | loin-cloth | 𓂧 𓃛 𓅱 𓈀

𓈖 𓊪 𓂋 𓏏 𓈇 𓏥 | brim (of well), flat slab, basis | Nabel √nieder? nah.Brett? 𓈖 𓊪 𓂋 𓏏 𓈀 𓏥 | brim (of well), flat slab, basis | 1-Brett ++? <> 𓈖𓊪𓂋* na.brim
